headline: Baxter to Present at J.P. Morgan 2026 Healthcare Conference
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., January 06, 2026--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a global medtech leader, will present at the J.P. Morgan 2026 Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 12, 2026. Andrew Hider, Baxter’s president and chief executive officer, is scheduled to present at 2:15 p.m. Pacific Time.
